item.title: Ditch MAMP on Snow Leopard
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: I was fond of the stack XAMPP offered when I developed on Windows and lazily continued used XAMPP/MAMP once I moved to a Mac OS X based workstation.

item.author: Eric Simmerman

item.author: Eric Simmerman
